channel.title: Aquiring Summon Question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Aquiring Summon Question"

item.title: Re: Aquiring Summon Question
item.content:encoded:
First, go to main page. There's a button "Summons". Will show all possible summons for you, than choose one and click in a button below "Tame Summon".

It's a special mission, nothing would be a problem to a Jounin, as you said you are.

item.title: Aquiring Summon Question
item.content:encoded: One of my alts managed to get in a pretty decent sized village with a summoning circle, and has just made Jounin. Between finishing up the Reaper path, I also wanted to look into getting some summons to help, only thing is I can't seem to figure out how. The site says I need to be either Best Friends that day or have 300 friendship points. I've got four of the summon masters with 600 or (much) higher. How exactly do I get a summoning contract?
